### Inputs

<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="fpgaurl_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#fpgaurl_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Fpga<wbr>Url</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd><p>COS URL address of the FPGA image file.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="instanceid_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#instanceid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Instance<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The ID information of the instance.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="dbdfs_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#dbdfs_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Dbd<wbr>Fs</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The DBDF number of the FPGA card on the instance, if left blank, the FPGA image will be burned to all FPGA cards owned
by the instance by default.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="dryrun_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#dryrun_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Dry<wbr>Run</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Trial run, will not perform the actual burning action, the default is False.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>

The following state arguments are supported:


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_dbdfs_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_dbdfs_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Dbd<wbr>Fs</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The DBDF number of the FPGA card on the instance, if left blank, the FPGA image will be burned to all FPGA cards owned
by the instance by default.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_dryrun_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_dryrun_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Dry<wbr>Run</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Trial run, will not perform the actual burning action, the default is False.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_fpgaurl_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_fpgaurl_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Fpga<wbr>Url</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>COS URL address of the FPGA image file.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_instanceid_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_instanceid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Instance<wbr>Id</a>

    </dt>
    <dd><p>The ID information of the instance.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="yaml">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_dbdfs_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_dbdfs_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">dbd<wbr>Fs</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;String&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The DBDF number of the FPGA card on the instance, if left blank, the FPGA image will be burned to all FPGA cards owned
by the instance by default.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_dryrun_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_dryrun_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">dry<wbr>Run</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Boolean</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Trial run, will not perform the actual burning action, the default is False.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_fpgaurl_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_fpgaurl_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">fpga<wbr>Url</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>COS URL address of the FPGA image file.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_instanceid_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_instanceid_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">instance<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The ID information of the instance.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>
